subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Two uncharacteristic botches by first baseman Mark Teixeira, along with a misplay by third baseman Eric Chavez and an error by shortstop Eduardo Nunez, cost the Yankees in Game 4 of the A.LC.S.
snippet: Two uncharacteristic botches by first baseman Mark Teixeira, along with a misplay by third baseman Eric Chavez and an error by shortstop Eduardo Nunez, cost the Yankees in Game 4 of the A.LC.S.
